Falls Prevention Program

Falls are the leading cause of injury among older Canadians. Luckily, there are ways to prevent falls and to make them less harmful when they happen. Statistics on fall prevention programs show they decrease falls by up to 55%.

Many community and recreation centres throughout BC offer programs such as Osteofit and Get Up & Go! classes. To learn more about how to prevent falls and where you can attend helpful programs, visitÂ pacifichealthyaging.ca

The British Columbia Ministry of Health will launch a provincial-wide Falls Prevention Strategy in 2024. Stay tuned for more updates and programs!
